title: PC in the spotlight: Dell transforms the personal computer for the AI age
description: When Michael Dell (pictured) launched his computer company from a dorm room at the University of Texas in 1984, he envisioned a world where the personal computer would be a device everyone would want. More than 40 years later, he finds himself still meeting t…
